   sphinx-quickstart on Tue Jun  1 18:55:15 2021.

   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to Sbfit!
=================================

Sbfit is a Python package for analysing surface brightness profiles of
astronomical diffuse X-ray sources, e.g. galaxy clusters.

   :maxdepth: 1
   :caption: User Guide
